item.title: Golf Rush
item.description: A golf game i made with my friend. I mostly focused on art but I have also done some programming & design.

item.title: Carton Box Model
item.description: I made this model with performance in mind. It’s purpose is to look as realistic as possible with a minimal amount of vertices.

item.title: Post Processing Shaders
item.description: A collection of some full screen shaders I made to improve the look of a game.

item.title: Blender Renders
item.description: A Collections of renders that I made and rendered in Blender. Some where part of a weekly challenge and others where for fun.

item.title: D&D Renders
item.description: A collection of renders I made in blender to support a D&D campaign i wrote.

item.title: Game Jams
item.description: A collection of games I made for various game jams. Mostly 2d but some 3d games.

item.title: Metis GameJam
item.description: A game I made in ~8 hours for an in person game jam in a team ranging ages 13-17.

item.title: Pyrofism
item.description: Pyrofism was the first game I published and was made for a week long gamejam.
